events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello, I’m Jessica from customer support. I’m here to assist you with the refund process for your order.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so that I can start the refund process?
Here is my order number #123456 and attached is a photo showing that the item delivered is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and you can keep the incorrect item as an apology for the inconvenience.
I appreciate the quick response and that I can keep the item. Thank you for resolving this so promptly.
The refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to ensure you have received the refund and that there are no further issues with your order.
We are closing this case now since the refund has been confirmed and no additional concerns were raised.
